Package org.maugiam.shoppingcart.purchase

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IOrder
    Interface to the Purchase Orders
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbsDiscount
    The discount model is implemented by an adapter pattern.
    FirstPercentageDiscount
    This class is a subclass of PercentageDiscount, in this case the discount percentage is calculated from the first item of the items list ordered by a criteria
    PercentageDiscount
    This class implement a Discount (IDiscount)
    PriceComparator
    This is a calss that implements a comparator for IItem, this is part of an strategy pattern to make ordering procedures over a collection of IItems.
    PurchaseOrder
    This class implements IOrder inferface and represents the shopping cart.
    PurchaseOrderFactory
    This class is a factory of purchase order.
